ValidationRule.description: When the Claim Origin is Distributor, the Distributor field must be filled.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( TEXT(Origin) = 'Distributor', TEXT(Claim_Stage__c) = 'Submitted', OR( RecordType.Name = 'Commercial Claim', RecordType.Name = 'Residential Claim' ), ISBLANK( Distributor__r.Id) )
